name: Messy Mash
description:
This is a simple clicker game, an Entry for Trijam #88 , finished in 2:41:52.23. 

Smash the hot potatoes and figure out how much weight in mash you've accomplished ! 

(BGM by Bensound)

(Kitchen Background :https://opengameart.org/content/kitchen-background-4-styles)

Thank you for hosting this !
